CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

December 6, 2007

[Cite as 12/0612007 Case Announcements, 2007-Ohio-6479.]

RECONSIDERATION OF PRIOR DECISIONS

2007-1776. Cincinnati Community Kollel v. Levin.

Board of Tax Appeals, No. 2004-K-1441 and 2004-K-1442. Reported at 116 Ohio St.3d 1407, 2007-Ohio-6173, 876 N.E.2d 965. On motion for reconsideration. Motion denied.
